title: Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) WiFi vs Cellular model: Whatâ€™s the difference?
content:
Apple unveiled the 5G-enabled iPad Air 5 (2022) during its Peek Performance virtual event. Despite it sharing the same chassis with the previous-gen model, it still brings plenty of improvements. Most notably, it includes Apple’s M1 chip, supports 5G networks, and comes in five vivid finishes. For $599 only, you can buy the iPad Air

The post Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) WiFi vs Cellular model: What’s the difference? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple revealed the iPad Air 5 (2022) during its Peek Performance event. This is the vs between WiFi and Cellular models. What's different?
